Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.actors.player

Class UserSuperman

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.actors.enemies.FighterSpider
com.example.demo.actors.player.UserSuperman
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserSuperman extends FighterSpider
Represents the player's character in the game, "UserSuperman."

The UserSuperman can move within defined screen boundaries, fire projectiles, and use power-ups like spread shot. It interacts with the game through its parent level, leveraging game managers for sound, projectiles, and interactions.

This class extends FighterSpider to utilize health management and interaction capabilities.

      Parameters:
      levelParent - The parent level managing this superman.
      initialHealth - Initial health of the user's superman.

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile. If a spread shot power-up is active, fires multiple projectiles.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterSpider
      Returns:
      The center projectile (or one of the spread shot projectiles for compatibility).

      Creates and returns a list of spread shot projectiles.
      Returns:
